ratapura dawantha sanwardhana wadapiliwelak kriyathmaka karamin elambaena 2016 wanawita dilindukamin thora shri lankawak nirmanaya karana bawa aarthika sanwardhana amathi basil rajapaksha mahatha awadharanaya karayi.diwi naguma wadasatahana yatathe merata gramasewa wasam 14,008k pura kriyathmaka kerena athara gramasewa wasamakin dilidu pawul 50 bangin pawul laksha 7k thoragena ee siyalla mulumanin sanwardhanaya kota me wadapiliwela kriyathmaka karana bawada amathiwaraya penwadeyi.shri lankawe krushikarmantha kshethraya diyunu kirimata rajaya gena athi ilakkagatha wadapiliwela yatathe mema piyawara ganna bawa pawasana basil rajapaksha mahatha ratapura pihiti gowijana sewa madhyasthana 577 anga sampurna ayurin nawikaranaya kirimata piyawara gena thibena bawada ema sama madhyasthanayakma aadarshamath sthanayak bawata path karana bawada sandahan karayi.amathiwaraya me bawa sandahan kale maharagama jathika tharuna sewa sabha shrawanagarayedi pawathi gowijana sewa departhamenthuwe idiri salasma saha karya bharaya pilibandawa ema departhamenthuwe jyeshta niladharin danuwath kirima sandaha pawathi wadamuluwa amathamini.idam himi gowiyeku lesath anda gowiyeku lesath lada athdakim janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathatath thamatath pawathina bawa sihipath kala basil rajapaksha mahatha deshapalanayata paminiye gowithanin bawada pilip gunawardhana mahatha gena aa kumbauru panatha mulinma kriyathmaka karana ladde thama piyanange mulikathwayen hambanthotadi bawada prakasha kaleya.kobbakaduwa mahathage mulikathwayen aarambha karana lada gowijanasewa madhyasthana me wanawita wiwidhakaraye wenaskam walata bhajanaya wemin wikashanayana wi athi bawa penwa dun aarthika sanwardhana amathiwaraya ema sthana gowiyata pamanak nowa sama siyalu denatama pi්rayamanapa aadarshamath sthana bawata sanwardhanaya karana atharama ehi sewaya sama denatama laba ganimata hakiwana paridi diyunu kalayuthu bawada thrasthawadaya hethuwen uthuru nangenahira pradeshawala krushikarmantha keshethraye dadi balapam siduwu bawada pawasiya.anda gowiyage ayithiya aaraksha kirime sita kumbauru panatha sambandhayen pana nangina gatalu wisadimatada mema departhamenthuwata siduwa athi bawa penwadun ee mahatha nithi katayuthuwalata pamanak sima nowi gowi janathawata awashya sanwardhana katayuthu sandaha wadi nambauruthawayak dakwiya yuthu bawada 1957 wasare okthobar masa 01 wanada aarambha karanu labu gowijana sewa sanwardhana departhamenthuwa mangin 1958 hadunwadun kumbauru panatha kriyathmaka kirima, sulu warimarga nadaththuwa, pohora sahanadhara kriyathmaka kirima, gowi marga upadeshakayeku lesa katayuthu kirima aadi karunu rashiyak danata kriyathmaka kerena bawada sandahan kaleya.me athara ee mahatha penwa dunne akkara 200 ta adu siyayata 45k tharam wana sulu warmarga sanwardhanaya gowijana sewa departhamenthuwata ayath wuwath ee ha sambandha anekuth rajya aayathanawalada sahayogaya labagena sanwardhana katayuthu sidukara eewa aaraksha kirime wagakima departhamenthuwa bharagatha yuthu bawath me wanawita sanwardhanaya kalayuthu siyaluma sulu warmarga hadunagena eewa kalasimawakata yatathwa sanwardhanaya kirimata piyawara gatha yuthu bawathya."pohora sahanadharaya labadimedi departhamenthuwata me wanawita labi athi paminili ithama alpaya.

mahajana chandayen balayata aa chawesta erehi hamuda kumanthranayak 2002 di diyath kerina.paya 48 ta aasanna kalayak kumanthranaya pawathina.chawes balayen aswamika kerini.chawes wirodhi wyaparikayek wu pedro karmona janadhipathi lesa nam kerunu athara mema hamuda kumanthranaya amarikawe niw york tayims puwath patha wigraha kale "prajathanthrawadaye jayagrahanayak" lesaya.wenisiyuwelanu prajathanthrawadaya thawaduratath "ipadimata niyamitha" eekadhipathiyekuge tharjanayen pida nowidinu athayi 2002 aprel 13 ehi kathuwakiya pawasiya.2000 wasaredi chawes balayata pathwa thibune prakashitha chanda sankhyawen 59.76% k labaganimini.chandayen balayata path janadhipathiwarayekugen prajathanthrawadaya rakaganu was "hamuda kumanthranayakata" batahira libaral puwathpath aa wadima sithganna sulu wihiluwak noweda?
